		<title>HurricaneHackersNYC</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/hurricanehackersnyc/?instance_id=</link>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[ITP, NYU Tisch School of the Arts

721 Broadway

New York, NY 10003

<strong>Saturday, November 17, 2012 from 9:00 AM to 11:00 PM</strong>

<strong>(</strong><a href="http://hurricanehackersnyc-es2.eventbrite.com/?rank=1"><strong>Register here</strong></a><strong>)</strong>

I'm requesting that <strong><em>anyone</em></strong> with first hand experience on the ground (from the last mile to the hubs*) come by around 3pm. I'll do my best to get people there who can train you but it will also be good to just come by and talk to really excited people that want to build things to help us do the work we do.

<a href="http://occupysms.org/">OccupySMS</a> will be there along with many others.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Yoga Class @ 520 Clinton Avenue</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/yoga-class-520-clinton-avenue/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 15 Nov 2012 05:31:19 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>andrea</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=451&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Elana Bulman is teaching a yoga class Sunday from 7 pm-8 pm at 520 Clinton Ave.

This class will include:
* Lots of back stretches, especially beneficial if your back is sore from hauling people's life possessions out to the curb and/or long hours hunched over a computer
* Breathing techniques to use in moments of stress and tension
* Yogic philosophy on how to work intensely without getting emotionally drained

If you'd like to come, please wear stretchy clothes and bring a yoga mat or a towel if you can. Beginners are very welcome. Feel free to invite other volunteers and community members!]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Clean Up And Construction Organizers Only Meeting</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/clean-up-and-construction-organizers-only-meeting/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Nov 2012 14:37:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>andrea</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=455&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[We would like to have a meeting with all of the groups organizing clean up and construction in the Rockaways.  Please send this to relevant contacts.

The purpose of the meeting will be to share information about our programs to ensure that we are not duplicating efforts and that all of the home work needs of the community are being met. We are also looking for people who have the availability and commitment to join our team. We are receiving enormous volunteer and community interest in the work we are doing and have many roles that need to be filled.

To be clear this meeting is not intended for volunteers who want to volunteer for 1 or 2 days.

The meeting will be held at Arverne Pilgrim Church on the corner of B74th and Beach Channel Drive at 1pm Friday the 16th.

Apologies for the short notice. If you are not able to attend, we intend to hold these meetings regularly, and I encourage you to attend the next one.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>455</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2012-11-16 09:37:34</wp:post_date>

	<item>
		<title>Occupy Sandy In Person Meeting </title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/occupy-sandy-in-person-meeting/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 19 Nov 2012 09:18:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>andrea</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=465&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[1. In person meeting - Tuesday, 11/20, 7:30 PM.  St. Jacobi Church in Sunset Park, 5406 4th ave

 Agenda

Where have we been?

(How did Occupy Sandy come about? What are the decisions that were made that got this project off the ground? By whom and how were they made? What structures were established for decision-making and allocation of funds and resources? How has our work been received by effected communities and the larger audience?)

Where are we now?

(What is the work that is currently happening on the ground? How is it evolving and what plans are currently in development? Are there logistical limitations to the work we’re doing and how can it be improved?)

Where are we going?

(What are our goals and intentions for the Occupy Sandy Project both in the short term and long term? What are the needs and goals of the communities we have been working with and how what roles do we play within that?)

How do we get there?

(Most likely will not be addressed within this meeting, but we should keep this question in mind as we gather information to work towards getting on the same page in hopes of moving forward in an accessible and equitable way.)

When is the next meeting?                                                                                                                  

(What action steps do we need to fulfill before then?)]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Occupy Sandy Community Meeting </title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/occupy-sandy-community-meeting/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 19 Nov 2012 09:18:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>andrea</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=488&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Dear Occupy Sandy Community!

At our first in person meeting last Tuesday, we decided to have another one this week - same time and place, Tuesday, 11/27 at 7:30 PM at St. Jacobi Church at 5406 4th Ave (54th and 4th ave in Sunset Park, BK).
<h2>Agenda</h2>
Anyone can add to the weekly agenda at the link below.

A list of regular report-backs that will come before other agenda items can be found at the link below. Please add agenda items under the list of regular report-backs and put your name next to any agenda item you add.

<a href="http://interoccupy.net/sandyagenda" target="_blank" class="button">Agenda</a>

PLEASE DO YOUR BEST TO ATTEND. We encourage site bottom liners to loop in and invite community members and organizers who might have an interest in attending.
<h3>Monday &amp; Thursday Coordination Conference Calls</h3>
Also, don't forget our regular conference calls every Monday and Thursday at 9PM EST that anyone can join.

<a href="http://crm.interoccupy.net/sites/all/modules/civicrm/extern/url.php?u=33372&amp;qid=498900" target="_blank" class="button">
Register for Call</a>

If you want to share information about the call to someone who CANNOT get to internet to register, they can use the call in number below:

<strong>Anonymous Call-in</strong>
+1 (530) 216-4363
PIN 633112]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Sandy Response and Recovery Meeting</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/490/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 26 Nov 2012 23:39:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=490&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Superstorm Sandy brought widespread destruction and disruption along the East coast. Hundreds of organizations, and hundreds of thousands of people mobilized to help those in need and, more than ever before, we saw the power of the Internet being used as a tool for both preparedness and response.

People are still in need and there is still work to be done for recovery. Governments, NGOs and the private sector also have much to learn on how we can work together to prevent the next storm’s destruction.

Google is bringing together members of the response community on the morning of Wednesday, November 28th, to share best practices and challenges from the Hurricane Sandy preparedness and response efforts. We’ll also discuss new tools and collaborative efforts that are being used to help increase communication and get the word out before, during and after a crisis.

Please join us for a keynote address by the Crisis Response team, and talks by Product Managers Payal Patel and Nigel Snoad. These will be followed by breakout sessions discussing how open standards for data are helping to extend the reach of information in times of crisis.

Engineers and partnerships experts from Google will be on hand to provide background information, and to help organisations get involved with the Public Alerts platform.
<h2>Agenda</h2>
<strong>8:00 – 8:40</strong>: Registration on ground floor
<strong>8:30 – 9:30</strong>: Breakfast and 1:1 sessions with Google engineers and partnerships.
<strong>9:30 – 10:00</strong>: Keynote Address
<strong>10:15 – 11:30</strong>: Breakout sessions
<em>Debriefing from Sandy: Lessons learned &amp; future work</em>
<ul>
	<li>Emergency Management &amp; Response</li>
	<li>Data &amp; Partnerships</li>
	<li>Crisis Maps</li>
</ul>
<strong>11:45-12:00pm</strong>: Report back/closing remarks

Please RSVP:<a href=" http://goo.gl/AfjKm" target="_blank"> http://goo.gl/AfjKm</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>#NYTechResponds Sandy Benefit Weekend</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/nytechresponds-sandy-benefit-weekend/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 27 Nov 2012 00:01:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=491&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Over the last few years, the NY technology sector has exploded and blossomed. Yet Hurricane Sandy has delivered a serious blow to our home city - the city where we've chosen to build, code, and grow our businesses. It’s been amazing to see how the NY Tech community has stepped up and collaborated across different organizations to help Sandy relief and recovery. But there is still much more for us to do - both to recover now and to prepare before the next disaster hits.

On December 1st &amp; 2nd the NY Tech community is coming together as #NYTechResponds for a Sandy Relief Agency Conference, Hackathon, and Fundraiser in New York City. This is your opportunity to take what you do best - designing and developing technology - and apply those skills directly to Sandy relief. We hope you will join us.
<ul>
	<li>REGISTER HERE: <a href="http://bit.ly/nytrhack" target="_blank">http://bit.ly/nytrhack</a></li>
</ul>
<h2>Agenda</h2>
<h3>Saturday December 1st</h3>
<strong>9am to 11am</strong>: Relief Agency Conference

Panel discussions on
<ul>
	<li>The recovery so far - what’s worked, what’s not worked</li>
	<li>What's needed next to support long term recovery</li>
	<li>What we need to better prepare for the next disaster, and what’s needed to allow us to respond more effectively</li>
</ul>
<strong>11am - 12:30am</strong>: Project Pitches Hackathon Kick-off

Team Creation, API &amp; Platforms Overview

<strong>1:30pm to 6:30pm</strong>: Hackathon Day 1

<strong>7pm to 9pm</strong>: Pizza “Thank You” Dinner for Relief Workers and Hackers
<h3>Sunday December 2nd</h3>
<strong>8:00am to 2:00pm</strong>: Hackathon Day 2

<strong>3pm to 5pm</strong>: Hack Presentations, Reviews and Awards. Prizes include:
<ul>
	<li>The hacker who raises the most money for the <a href="http://twitter.com/#NYTechResponds" target="_blank">#NYTechResponds</a> giving campaign (<a href="http://bit.ly/nytrgive" target="_blank">http://bit.ly/nytrgive</a>) will win 30 minutes to pitch to Steve Schlafman</li>
	<li>30 minutes to pitch to a partner at ff Ventures (“open” all hack category)</li>
	<li>$1000 in total monetary prizes in the "open" all hack category for winners to allocate out to the disaster relief agencies of their choice</li>
	<li>Two $500 prizes given by NYSERDA for best energy related projects</li>
	<li>Free weeks at a NYC co-working space</li>
	<li>Other prizes to be announced soon</li>
</ul>
<strong>5pm to 7:30pm</strong>: Sandy Benefit Event]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Occupy Sandy Community Meeting</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/occupy-sandy-community-meeting-3/?instance_id=</link>

	<item>
		<title>Hurricane Sandy Disaster Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Application - Brooklyn</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/hurricane-sandy-disaster-supplemental-nutrition-assistance-application-brooklyn/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 Dec 2012 18:36:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=511&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[The USDA has approved New York State's proposal on a Disaster Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (D-SNAP) initiative in New York City's most devastated areas (please see the below and attached for specific information). The initiative has a limited duration of seven days and HRA will begin the application process on December 12, 2012.
<h2>Eligible Zip Codes (As of October 27, 2012)</h2>
<ul>
	<li><strong> Coney Island</strong>, Brooklyn (zip codes 11224 and 11235)</li>
	<li><strong> Red Hook</strong>, Brooklyn (zip code 11231)</li>
	<li><strong> Gerritsen Beach South of Allen Avenue</strong>, Brooklyn (partial area of zip code 11229)</li>
	<li><strong> Lower East Side</strong>, Manhattan (zip code 10002)</li>
	<li><strong> Staten Island</strong>: Southeast shore (zip code 10306), and North Midland Beach South of Seaview Avenue (partial area of zip code 10305)</li>
	<li><strong> The Rockaways</strong>, Queens (zip codes 11691, 11692, 11693, 11694, and 11697)</li>
</ul>
<h2>Locations</h2>
<ol>
	<li>
<h3>Brooklyn: 495 Clermont Avenue</h3>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Dates of operation</strong>: Wednesday, 12/12 through Tuesday, 12/18</li>
	<li><strong>Hours</strong>: 8:30 a.m. 6 p.m.</li>
	<li>For the first two days at the Brooklyn location, we are accepting applicants alphabetically, according t0 last name:
<ul>
	<li><strong>Wednesday, December 12</strong>, only applicants with a <strong>last name</strong> beginning with <strong>A through M</strong>; and</li>
	<li><strong>Thursday, December 13,</strong> only applicants with a <strong>last name</strong> beginning with <strong>N through Z.</strong></li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li><strong>All other days are open to all applicants</strong> regardless of the beginning of their last names.</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>
<h3>Staten Island: New Dorp High School, 465 New Dorp Lane</h3>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Dates and hours of operation:</strong>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Friday, 12/14</strong>: 4 p.m. t0 8 p.m.</li>
	<li><strong>Saturday, 12/15</strong> and <strong>Sunday, 12/16</strong>: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.</li>
	<li><strong>Monday, 12/17</strong>: 4 p.m. to 8 p.m.</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>This location is open on the days above to all applicants regardless of last name.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
We ask that you inform <strong>current SNAP beneficiaries not to apply in person</strong>. For those who <strong>are currently receiving Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program benefits</strong> (SNAP, commonly known as food stamps), they will <strong>automatically receive D-SNAP if their benefit amount</strong> for November 2012 was less than the maximum amount allowed for their household size. Current SNAP recipients will not receive D-SNAP if they already received the maximum benefit amount.

We ask that you inform current SNAP beneficiaries not to apply in person. The benefits, for those eligible, will automatically appear on recipients' EBT cards, similar to the automatic replacement benefits they received in early November.

Additionally, only people with storm-related expenses may apply. Food loss does not count as a storm-related expense. It is important for you, as you speak to non-SNAP recipients living in the above zip codes, to let them know that they will be asked to verify expenses due to home and/or car damage, hotel stays, etc.

Finally, it's important to remind people that identity must be verified and that they must have lived in one of the targeted zip codes on October 27, 2012. These factors must be documented in order to receive DSNAP benefits. Therefore, applicants should be strongly encouraged to bring any relevant documentation to support their application. Other documentation regarding income, resources and family composition will be reviewed and independently verified. If applicants are not currently residing in their homes because of storm-related damage, they should provide a reliable mailing address to which a benefit card can be mailed.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>511</wp:post_id>

		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>ai1ec_event</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

	<item>
		<title>Hurricane Sandy Disaster Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Application - Staten Island</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/hurricane-sandy-disaster-supplemental-nutrition-assistance-application-staten-island/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 Dec 2012 18:36:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=512&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[The USDA has approved New York State's proposal on a Disaster Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (D-SNAP) initiative in New York City's most devastated areas (please see the below and attached for specific information). The initiative has a limited duration of seven days and HRA will begin the application process on December 12, 2012.
<h2>Eligible Zip Codes (As of October 27, 2012)</h2>
<ul>
	<li><strong> Coney Island</strong>, Brooklyn (zip codes 11224 and 11235)</li>
	<li><strong> Red Hook</strong>, Brooklyn (zip code 11231)</li>
	<li><strong> Gerritsen Beach South of Allen Avenue</strong>, Brooklyn (partial area of zip code 11229)</li>
	<li><strong> Lower East Side</strong>, Manhattan (zip code 10002)</li>
	<li><strong> Staten Island</strong>: Southeast shore (zip code 10306), and North Midland Beach South of Seaview Avenue (partial area of zip code 10305)</li>
	<li><strong> The Rockaways</strong>, Queens (zip codes 11691, 11692, 11693, 11694, and 11697)</li>
</ul>
<h2>Locations</h2>
<ol>
	<li>
<h3>Brooklyn: 495 Clermont Avenue</h3>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Dates of operation</strong>: Wednesday, 12/12 through Tuesday, 12/18</li>
	<li><strong>Hours</strong>: 8:30 a.m. 6 p.m.</li>
	<li>For the first two days at the Brooklyn location, we are accepting applicants alphabetically, according t0 last name:
<ul>
	<li><strong>Wednesday, December 12</strong>, only applicants with a <strong>last name</strong> beginning with <strong>A through M</strong>; and</li>
	<li><strong>Thursday, December 13,</strong> only applicants with a <strong>last name</strong> beginning with <strong>N through Z.</strong></li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li><strong>All other days are open to all applicants</strong> regardless of the beginning of their last names.</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>
<h3>Staten Island: New Dorp High School, 465 New Dorp Lane</h3>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Dates and hours of operation:</strong>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Friday, 12/14</strong>: 4 p.m. t0 8 p.m.</li>
	<li><strong>Saturday, 12/15</strong> and <strong>Sunday, 12/16</strong>: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.</li>
	<li><strong>Monday, 12/17</strong>: 4 p.m. to 8 p.m.</li>
</ul>
</li>
	<li>This location is open on the days above to all applicants regardless of last name.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
We ask that you inform <strong>current SNAP beneficiaries not to apply in person</strong>. For those who <strong>are currently receiving Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program benefits</strong> (SNAP, commonly known as food stamps), they will <strong>automatically receive D-SNAP if their benefit amount</strong> for November 2012 was less than the maximum amount allowed for their household size. Current SNAP recipients will not receive D-SNAP if they already received the maximum benefit amount.

We ask that you inform current SNAP beneficiaries not to apply in person. The benefits, for those eligible, will automatically appear on recipients' EBT cards, similar to the automatic replacement benefits they received in early November.

Additionally, only people with storm-related expenses may apply. Food loss does not count as a storm-related expense. It is important for you, as you speak to non-SNAP recipients living in the above zip codes, to let them know that they will be asked to verify expenses due to home and/or car damage, hotel stays, etc.

Finally, it's important to remind people that identity must be verified and that they must have lived in one of the targeted zip codes on October 27, 2012. These factors must be documented in order to receive DSNAP benefits. Therefore, applicants should be strongly encouraged to bring any relevant documentation to support their application. Other documentation regarding income, resources and family composition will be reviewed and independently verified. If applicants are not currently residing in their homes because of storm-related damage, they should provide a reliable mailing address to which a benefit card can be mailed.]]></content:encoded>

		<pubDate>Wed, 12 Dec 2012 18:36:21 +0000</pubDate>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=514&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[The USDA has approved New York State's proposal on a Disaster Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (D-SNAP) initiative in New York City's most devastated areas (please see the below and attached for specific information). The initiative has a limited duration of seven days and HRA will begin the application process on December 12, 2012.
<h2>Eligible Zip Codes (As of October 27, 2012)</h2>
<ul>
	<li><strong> Coney Island</strong>, Brooklyn (zip codes 11224 and 11235)</li>
	<li><strong> Red Hook</strong>, Brooklyn (zip code 11231)</li>
	<li><strong> Gerritsen Beach South of Allen Avenue</strong>, Brooklyn (partial area of zip code 11229)</li>
	<li><strong> Lower East Side</strong>, Manhattan (zip code 10002)</li>
	<li><strong> Staten Island</strong>: Southeast shore (zip code 10306), and North Midland Beach South of Seaview Avenue (partial area of zip code 10305)</li>
	<li><strong> The Rockaways</strong>, Queens (zip codes 11691, 11692, 11693, 11694, and 11697)</li>
</ul>
<h2>Locations</h2>
<ol>
	<li>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Dates of operation</strong>: Wednesday, 12/12 through Tuesday, 12/18</li>
	<li><strong>Hours</strong>: 8:30 a.m. 6 p.m.</li>
	<li>For the first two days at the Brooklyn location, we are accepting applicants alphabetically, according t0 last name:

	<li><strong>Wednesday, December 12</strong>, only applicants with a <strong>last name</strong> beginning with <strong>A through M</strong>; and</li>

</ul>
</li>

</ul>
</li>
	<li>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Dates and hours of operation:</strong>

	<li><strong>Saturday, 12/15</strong> and <strong>Sunday, 12/16</strong>: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.</li>

</ul>
</li>
	<li>This location is open on the days above to all applicants regardless of last name.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
We ask that you inform <strong>current SNAP beneficiaries not to apply in person</strong>. Current SNAP recipients will not receive D-SNAP if they already received the maximum benefit amount.

We ask that you inform current SNAP beneficiaries not to apply in person. The benefits, for those eligible, will automatically appear on recipients' EBT cards, similar to the automatic replacement benefits they received in early November.

Additionally, only people with storm-related expenses may apply. Food loss does not count as a storm-related expense. It is important for you, as you speak to non-SNAP recipients living in the above zip codes, to let them know that they will be asked to verify expenses due to home and/or car damage, hotel stays, etc.

Finally, it's important to remind people that identity must be verified and that they must have lived in one of the targeted zip codes on October 27, 2012. These factors must be documented in order to receive DSNAP benefits. Therefore, applicants should be strongly encouraged to bring any relevant documentation to support their application. Other documentation regarding income, resources and family composition will be reviewed and independently verified. If applicants are not currently residing in their homes because of storm-related damage, they should provide a reliable mailing address to which a benefit card can be mailed.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Webinar: National Donations Management Network Training</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/webinar-national-donations-management-network-training/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 16 Dec 2012 21:59:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=523&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Introduction to NDMN/Posting Needs/Entering Offers</h2>
NDMN is the National Donations Management Network, an online database used by non-profit agencies and voluntary agencies active in disaster (VOAD) to make and receive in-kind donations. Non-profit and VOAD groups can register with the system, post needs which are visible to the public, and donations can be made to a specific posted need or make a general offer.

This system is used by over 40 states as the preferred method of making a donation as it cuts down on unsolicited donations and encourages communication between donors and recipients of needed donations. The donor of an in-kind donation can make one post for a offer, or phone call, and multiple agencies can see the offer.

The NY State portal can be accessed at <a href="http://www.ndmn.us/ny" target="_blank">www.ndmn.us/ny</a> or offers can be made by calling 1-855-NYS-SANDY (855-697-7263)
<h3>More information</h3>
<ul>
	<li><a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xGPpdXM8tTs" target="_blank">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xGPpdXM8tTs</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://www.aidmatrix.org/aboutus/index.htm" target="_blank">http://www.aidmatrix.org/aboutus/index.htm</a></li>
</ul>
<a class="button" href="https://www3.gotomeeting.com/register/677575950" target="_blank">Register</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>523</wp:post_id>

		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-12-16 21:59:57</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>closed</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>webinar-national-donations-management-network-training</wp:post_name>

	<item>
		<title>Occupy Sandy Network Meeting</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/occupy-sandy-network-meeting/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 Dec 2012 09:18:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=558&#038;instance_id=</guid>

	<item>
		<title>People&#039;s Recovery Summit</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/peoples-recovery-summit/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 Dec 2012 09:34:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=560&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[A 3-day city-wide gathering of workshops, panels, concerts and performances to unite for a more equitable and sustainable rebuilding in Sandy's wake.

Friday MS/HS Youth Summit: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/events/392061107549534/" target="_blank">https://www.facebook.com/events/392061107549534/</a>
<h3>Desired Outcomes</h3>
<ul>
	<li>Connecting the dots between residents + advocates</li>
	<li>Connect environmental + economic justice, build better relationships between organizations towards a stronger, multi-tiered rebuilding process</li>
	<li>Gather intelligence on what the City/State/Federal government are/aren't doing, and what we need them to do</li>
	<li>Unveil a Sandy Report with policy suggestions for equitable/accountable development</li>
	<li>A human rights focus: accountability, transparency, participation</li>
	<li>Focus the conversation on equitable real estate development</li>
</ul>
<h3>Takeaways</h3>
<ul>
	<li>Community Toolkit of best practices for organizers + affected residents</li>
	<li>Needs assessment at Summit</li>
	<li>Sandy Pledge for politicians</li>
	<li>Non-violent direct action training</li>
	<li>Participatory budgeting (included in pledge)</li>
</ul>
<h3>Registration</h3>
<ul>
	<li>Register securely online at: <a href="http://summit.peoplesrecovery.org/" target="_blank">http://summit.peoplesrecovery.org/</a></li>
	<li>Conference only - $20</li>
	<li>Conference + concert access - $50</li>
	<li>Students, elders, unemployed - $10</li>
</ul>
*Full or partial scholarships available based on need
<h3>More Information</h3>
<ul>

	<item>
		<title>Webinar: National Donations Management Network Training</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/webinar-national-donations-management-network-training-2/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 01 Jan 2013 21:59:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=594&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Introduction to NDMN/Posting Needs/Entering Offers</h2>
NDMN is the National Donations Management Network, an online database used by non-profit agencies and voluntary agencies active in disaster (VOAD) to make and receive in-kind donations. Non-profit and VOAD groups can register with the system, post needs which are visible to the public, and donations can be made to a specific posted need or make a general offer.

This system is used by over 40 states as the preferred method of making a donation as it cuts down on unsolicited donations and encourages communication between donors and recipients of needed donations. The donor of an in-kind donation can make one post for a offer, or phone call, and multiple agencies can see the offer.

The NY State portal can be accessed at <a href="http://www.ndmn.us/ny" target="_blank">www.ndmn.us/ny</a> or offers can be made by calling 1-855-NYS-SANDY (855-697-7263)
<h3>More information</h3>
<ul>
	<li><a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xGPpdXM8tTs" target="_blank">http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xGPpdXM8tTs</a></li>
	<li><a href="http://www.aidmatrix.org/aboutus/index.htm" target="_blank">http://www.aidmatrix.org/aboutus/index.htm</a></li>
</ul>
<a class="button" href="https://www3.gotomeeting.com/register/278707278" target="_blank">Register</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Occupy Sandy and Participatory Budgeting</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/ai1ec_event/occupy-sandy-and-participatory-budgeting/?instance_id=</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 14 Jan 2013 02:30:08 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>patricia</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=ai1ec_event&#038;p=605&#038;instance_id=</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Occupy Sandy has been transitioning from immediate relief work to long term recovery. Now, it's time to figure out how we can empower those affected by the storm to make decisions about where the funds raised by Occupy Sandy and other organizations are going. Join us as we discuss participatory budgeting, its feasibility in recovery areas, and concrete steps we can take toward post-Sandy participatory budgeting.

What efforts are currently underway? What concrete first steps can we take toward incubating a participatory budgeting process in affected areas? How can Occupy Sandy leverage a commitment to participatory budgeting in order to compel big charities and government agencies to do the same?

Date: Friday, January 11th
Time: 6pm-8pm
Location: 122 Java St., Greenpoint, Brooklyn]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Toggle (jQuery) with frame</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=27</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/testhub/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=27</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>27</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2012-06-28 08:25:26</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-06-28 12:25:26</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>toggle-jquery-with-frame</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>csshortcode</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="csscategory" nicename="toggles"><![CDATA[Toggles]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_php</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_css</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
.toggle-box {
	margin-bottom:15px;
overflow:hidden;
}
.toggle-content { 
	display:none;
	-mox-border-radius-bottomleft:8px;
        -mox-border-radius-bottomright:8px;
	-webkit-border-bottom-left-radius:8px;
        -webkit-border-bottom-right-radius:8px;
	-html-border-bottom-left-radius:8px;
	-html-border-bottom-right-radius:8px;
	border-bottom-left-radius:8px;
        border-bottom-right-radius:8px;
	background:none repeat scroll 0 0 #FBFBFA;
	border-color:-moz-use-text-color #E6E6E6 #E6E6E6;
	border-color:#E6E6E6;
	border-right:1px solid #E6E6E6;
	border-style:none solid solid;
	border-width:medium 1px 1px;
	margin:0;
	padding:15px;
	overflow:hidden;

}

.toggle-title{
	-moz-border-radius:6px 6px 6px 6px;
	-webkit-border-radius:6px;
	-html-border-radius:6px;
	border-radius:6px;
	background:url("{pluginurl}images/toggle.png") no-repeat scroll -23px 20px #F1F1F1;
	border:1px solid #E6E6E6;
	color:#4E4C41;
	cursor:pointer;
	font-size:1.2em;
	margin:15px 0 0 !important;
	padding:15px 15px 10px 40px;
}

.toggle-title.open {
	-moz-border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;
	-webkit-border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;
	-html-border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;
	border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;
	background-position:10px -22px;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcode</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[sws_toggle1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcodes</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="toggle-box"><h3 class="toggle-title sws_toggle1">{title}</h3><div class="toggle-content">{content}</div></div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function($){ 
  $(".toggle-title.sws_toggle1").unbind('click').click(function(){
    $(this).toggleClass('open').next().slideToggle();
  });
});	
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		</wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>Toggle (jQuery) without frame</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=36</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/testhub/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=36</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>36</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2012-06-28 08:25:26</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-06-28 12:25:26</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>toggle-jquery-without-frame</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>csshortcode</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="csscategory" nicename="toggles"><![CDATA[Toggles]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcode</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[sws_toggle2]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcodes</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="toggle2-box">
<h3 class="toggle2-title sws_toggle2">{title}</h3>
<div class="toggle2-content-noframe">
{content}
</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_php</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_css</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
.toggle2-box {
	margin-bottom:15px;
overflow:hidden;
}
.toggle2-content-noframe { 
display:none;
margin:0;
padding:15px;
overflow:hidden;
}

.toggle2-title{
	-moz-border-radius:6px 6px 6px 6px;
	-webkit-border-radius:6px;
	-html-border-radius:6px;
	border-radius:6px;
	background:url("{pluginurl}images/toggle.png") no-repeat scroll -23px 20px #F1F1F1;
	border:1px solid #E6E6E6;
	color:#4E4C41;
	cursor:pointer;
	font-size:1.2em;
	margin:15px 0 0 !important;
	padding:15px 15px 10px 40px;
}

.toggle2-title.open {
	-moz-border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;
	-webkit-border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;
	-html-border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;
	border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;
	background-position:10px -22px;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function($){ 
  $(".toggle2-title.sws_toggle2").unbind('click').click(function(){
    $(this).toggleClass('open').next().slideToggle();
  });
});	
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_fields</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{s:5:"title";O:8:"stdClass":4:{s:4:"name";s:5:"title";s:5:"label";s:5:"Title";s:7:"default";s:5:"Title";s:4:"type";s:4:"text";}}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_bundle</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[starter]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_preview</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_scripts</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:0:{}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_styles</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:0:{}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_info</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:2:{s:6:"author";s:0:"";s:3:"url";s:0:"";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>Divider Go to Top</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=37</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/testhub/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=37</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>37</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2012-06-28 08:25:26</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-06-28 12:25:26</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>divider-go-to-top</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>csshortcode</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="csscategory" nicename="dividers"><![CDATA[Dividers]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcode</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[sws_divider_top]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcodes</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="divider_top"><a href="#">Top</a></div>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_php</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_css</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
.divider_top {
	position:relative;
	clear:both;
	display:block;
	padding-top:20px;
	margin-bottom:40px;
	border-bottom:1px solid #E6E6E6;
}
.divider_top a {
	position:absolute;
	right:0;
	top:10px;
	width:20px;
	background:none repeat scroll 0 0 #FFFFFF;
	font-size:12px;
	padding:0 5px;
	text-align:right;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#AAAAAA;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_fields</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:0:{}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_bundle</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[starter]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function init_base_scrollable(scrollable_sel,target_sel){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		$(scrollable_sel).each(function(i,o){
			var arr = $(this).attr('rel').split('|');

			var sel = arr[0];var col = arr[1];

			$(this).find('.gallery-icon a').each(function(j,p){
				gid = Math.floor(j/col);

				if( $(sel).find('.group'+gid).length==0 ){
					$('<div />').attr('class','group'+gid).appendTo( sel + ' .items' );
				}
				$( sel + ' .group' + gid ).append( $(this).show() );
			});
		});
		$(target_sel).scrollable().find('a').sws_lightbox();
	});
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

.sws-gallery {display:none;}

	display:block;

	float:left;

	margin: 10px 50px;

a.up:active  		{ background-position:-60px 0; }
a.down 				{ background-position: 0 -30px; }
a.down:hover  		{ background-position:-30px -30px; }
a.down:active  	{ background-position:-60px -30px; } 
a.disabled {
	visibility:hidden !important;		
} 	

.image_wrap {
	width:677px;
	margin:15px 0 15px 40px;
	padding:15px 0;
	text-align:center;
	background-color:#efefef;
	border:2px solid #fff;
	outline:1px solid #ddd;
	-moz-ouline-radius:4px;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function init_preview_scrollable(scrollable_sel,target_sel,wrap_sel){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		$(scrollable_sel).each(function(i,o){
			var arr = $(this).attr('rel').split('|');
			var sel = arr[0];var col = arr[1];
			$(this).find('.gallery-icon a').each(function(j,p){
				gid = Math.floor(j/col);
				if( $(sel).find('.group'+gid).length==0 ){
					$('<div />').attr('class','group'+gid).appendTo( sel + ' .items' );
				}
				var _img = $(this).find('img').clone().show();
				$(_img).attr('rel',$(this).attr('href')).show();
				$( sel + ' .group' + gid ).append( $(_img) );
			});
		});
		
		$(target_sel).find('img').click(function(){
			if ($(this).hasClass("active")) { return; }

			var url = $(this).attr("rel");
			var img = new Image();
			img.src = url;
			var wrap = $(wrap_sel).fadeTo("medium", 0.3,function(){
				wrap.find("img").attr("src", url);
				wrap.fadeTo("fast", 1);			
			});
			
			$(this).parent().parent().parent().find(".items img").removeClass("active");
			$(this).addClass("active");
			return false;
		});
		$(target_sel).find('img').show().css('opacity',1).css('visibility','visible');
		$(target_sel).scrollable().find('img:first').click();
	});
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

		<title>Google map</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=58</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:27 +0000</pubDate>

		<wp:post_id>58</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2012-06-28 08:25:27</wp:post_date>

		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>

		<wp:post_name>google-map</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>

		<wp:post_type>csshortcode</wp:post_type>

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="csscategory" nicename="maps"><![CDATA[Maps]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcode</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[sws_gmap3]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcodes</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:5:{i:0;s:7:"gmarker";i:1;s:16:"sws_gmap3_marker";i:2;s:16:"sws_gmap3_marker";i:3;s:16:"sws_gmap3_marker";i:4;s:16:"sws_gmap3_marker";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<h3>{map_title}</h3><div id="map_canvas{uid}" class="sws-gmap3-cont" style="width: {canvas_width}px; height: {canvas_height}px"></div><div id="sws-gmap3-marker-{uid}" class="sws-gmap3-marker">{content}</div><div class="sws-gmap3-marker"><div id="sws-gmap3-info-{uid}" >{info_windows}</div></div><script>jQuery(document).ready(function($){gmap3_init({glat:{glat},glon:{glon},zoom:{zoom},disableDefaultUI:{disableDefaultUI},map_type:google.maps.MapTypeId.{map_type},uid:{uid},name:"{name}",info_windows:"sws-gmap3-info-{uid}",markers:"#sws-gmap3-marker-{uid}",address:"{address}",traffic:{traffic}});});</script>
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_php</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_css</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
.sws-gmap3-marker {
display:none;
}
.sws-gmap3-cont img{
max-width:none !important;
max-height:none !important;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script type="text/javascript" src="http://maps.google.com/maps/api/js?sensor=false"></script>
<script>
function gmap3_init(obj){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		var address = obj.address;
		if(address!=''){
		    var geocoder_map = new google.maps.Geocoder();
			geocoder_map.geocode( { 'address': address}, function(results, status) {
				obj.address='';
				if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
					latlng = results[0].geometry.location;
					obj.glat = latlng.lat();
					obj.glon = latlng.lng();
				}
				return gmap3_init(obj);
			});			
		}
		
	    var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng( obj.glat, obj.glon);
	    var myOptions = {
	      zoom: obj.zoom,
	      center: latlng,
		  disableDefaultUI: obj.disableDefaultUI,
	      mapTypeId: obj.map_type
	    };

	    var map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById("map_canvas"+obj.uid), myOptions);
		var infowindow = new google.maps.InfoWindow({
		    content: document.getElementById(obj.info_windows)
		});
	
		if(obj.traffic){
			var trafficLayer = new google.maps.TrafficLayer();
			trafficLayer.setMap(map);
		}
	
		var marker = new google.maps.Marker({position: latlng,map: map,title:obj.name});
		google.maps.event.addListener(marker, 'click', function() {
		  infowindow.open(map,marker);
		});	
		
		var _markers_sel = obj.markers;
		var _markers = $(_markers_sel).html();

		var arr = _markers.split('::');
		var mmarker = [];
		var marker_content = [];
		if(arr.length>0){
			for(var a=0;a<arr.length;a++){
				var brr = arr[a].split('|');
				if(brr.length==4){
					if(brr[0].replace(' ','')==''){	continue;}
					var mlatlng = new google.maps.LatLng(brr[0], brr[1]);
					
					marker_content[a] = brr[3];	
					mmarker[a] = new google.maps.Marker({position: mlatlng,map: map,title:brr[2]});
					attachInfo(mmarker[a],a);
				}
			}
		}	
		
		function attachInfo(_marker, number) {
		    var infowindow = new google.maps.InfoWindow({ content: marker_content[number]});
		    google.maps.event.addListener(_marker, 'click', function() {
		        infowindow.open(map,_marker);
			});
		} 		
	});
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>

function sws_tooltip (obj){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){

		});
	});
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>

	<item>
		<title>Accordion (jQuery-UI)</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=61</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/testhub/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=61</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>61</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2012-06-28 08:25:27</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-06-28 12:25:27</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>accordion-jquery-ui</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>csshortcode</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="csscategory" nicename="accordion"><![CDATA[Accordion]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcode</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[accordion]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcodes</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:3:{i:0;s:15:"accordion_panel";i:1;s:14:"accodion-panel";i:2;s:14:"accodion-panel";}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div id="accordion-{uid}" class="sws-accordion">{content}</div><script>jQuery(document).ready(function($){sws_accordion('#accordion-{uid}',{autoHeight:{auto_height},collapsible:{collapsible},active:{active}});});</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_php</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_css</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
.ui-accordion-header {
margin-bottom:0px !important;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function sws_accordion(sel,options){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		$(sel).accordion(options);
	});	
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_fields</wp:meta_key>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script src="{pluginurl}js/xregexp-min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="{pluginurl}js/syntaxhighlighter_3.0.83/src/shCore.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="{pluginurl}js/syntaxhighlighter_3.0.83/src/shAutoloader.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script language="javascript">
function path(){
  var args = arguments,
  result = [];     
  for(var i = 0; i < args.length; i++)
      result.push(args[i].replace('@', '{pluginurl}js/syntaxhighlighter_3.0.83/scripts/'));
  return result
};

jQuery(document).ready(function($){ 
	SyntaxHighlighter.autoloader.apply(null, path(
	  'applescript            @shBrushAppleScript.js',
	  'actionscript3 as3      @shBrushAS3.js',
	  'bash shell             @shBrushBash.js',
	  'coldfusion cf          @shBrushColdFusion.js',
	  'cpp c                  @shBrushCpp.js',
	  'c# c-sharp csharp      @shBrushCSharp.js',
	  'css                    @shBrushCss.js',
	  'delphi pascal          @shBrushDelphi.js',
	  'diff patch pas         @shBrushDiff.js',
	  'erl erlang             @shBrushErlang.js',
	  'groovy                 @shBrushGroovy.js',
	  'java                   @shBrushJava.js',
	  'jfx javafx             @shBrushJavaFX.js',
	  'js jscript javascript  @shBrushJScript.js',
	  'perl pl                @shBrushPerl.js',
	  'php                    @shBrushPhp.js',
	  'text plain             @shBrushPlain.js',
	  'py python              @shBrushPython.js',
	  'ruby rails ror rb      @shBrushRuby.js',
	  'sass scss              @shBrushSass.js',
	  'scala                  @shBrushScala.js',
	  'sql                    @shBrushSql.js',
	  'vb vbnet               @shBrushVb.js',
	  'xml xhtml xslt html    @shBrushXml.js'
	));
	SyntaxHighlighter.all();
});	
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

function sws_tabs(sel,ulsel){

		$(sel).find('.sws-tab-li').each(function(i,o){
			$(this).appendTo(ulsel);
		});
		$(sel).uitabs();
	});	
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>

		<title>Toggle (UI Themed)</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=68</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>

		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-06-28 12:25:27</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>toggle-ui-themed</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="csscategory" nicename="toggles"><![CDATA[Toggles]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcode</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[sws_ui_toggle]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcodes</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:0:{}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div class="{jui_theme} ui-toggle ui-accordion ui-widget ui-helper-reset ui-accordion-icons" id="toggle-{uid}" role="tablist"><h3 id="ui-toggle-title-{uid}" class="ui-accordion-header ui-helper-reset ui-state-default ui-corner-top" role="tab" aria-expanded="true" tabindex="0"><span class="ui-icon ui-icon-triangle-1-s"></span><a href="javascript:void(0);" tabindex="-1">{title}</a></h3><div class="ui-accordion-content ui-helper-reset ui-widget-content ui-corner-bottom ui-accordion-content-active" role="tabpanel" id="ui-toogle-content-{uid}" style="display: block; overflow: auto;">{content}</div></div><script>jQuery(document).ready(function($){init_ui_toggle({'sel':'#ui-toggle-title-{uid}','tsel':'#ui-toogle-content-{uid}','closed':{closed},'duration':{duration}}); });</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_php</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_css</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
.ui-toggle h3 {
margin:0 !important;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function init_ui_toggle(o){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){ 
	  $(o.sel).click(function(){
	    $(this).find('.ui-icon').toggleClass('ui-icon-triangle-1-s').toggleClass('ui-icon-triangle-1-e');
		$(this).toggleClass('ui-state-active')
			.toggleClass('ui-state-default');
		$(o.tsel).slideToggle(o.duration);
	  });
	  if(o.closed){
	  	$(o.sel).click();
	  }
	});	
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_fields</wp:meta_key>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function init_ui_dialog(o){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){ 	
		_buttons = [];
		if(o.buttons!=''){
			var pairs =o.buttons.split('||');
			for(i=0;i<pairs.length;i++){
				var but = pairs[i].split('|');
				if(but.length==2){
					eval('_buttons[ _buttons.length ] = {text:but[0],click:function(){window.location.href="'+but[1]+'"}}');
				}
			}
		}
		_buttons[_buttons.length]={text:o.OKbuttonText,click:function(){$(this).dialog('close');}};
		$(o.dsel).dialog({
			width: (o.width<=0?'300':o.width),
			height: (o.height<=0?'auto':o.height),
			resizable: o.resizable,
			modal: o.modal,
			autoOpen: o.autoOpen,
			draggable: o.draggable,
			minWidth:o.minWidth,
			minHeight:o.minHeight,
			buttons: _buttons
		});
		$(o.tsel).click(function(){
			$(o.dsel).dialog('open');
		});
	});	
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>Button with icon (UI)</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=72</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>

		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>

		<wp:post_name>button-with-icon-ui</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcode</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[sws_button_icon_ui]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_shortcodes</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:0:{}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<a id="uibtn{uid}" target="{target}" href="{href}">{label}</a><script>jQuery(document).ready(function($){init_ui_button_with_icon({'sel':'#uibtn{uid}','href':'{href}','icon':'{icon}'});});</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_php</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_css</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function init_ui_button_with_icon(o){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		$( o.sel ).button({
			icons: {
				primary: o.icon
			}
		}).attr('href',o.href);
	});	 
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_fields</wp:meta_key>

	<item>
		<title>Color Box with Close</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=73</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:27 +0000</pubDate>

<div class="{color_box}_content sws_box_content" style="border-radius:{rounded_corners}px; -moz-border-radius:{rounded_corners}px; -webkit-border-radius:{rounded_corners}px;">
<div class="{close_button}" OnClick="javascript:jQuery(this).parent().parent().slideUp();"></div>
{content}
</div>
</div>]]></wp:meta_value>

.sws_color_box {
        position:relative;

       padding: 30px 20px 20px;
}

	margin-bottom: 0px;

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<div id="sws_table{uid}" class="sws_custom_table" style="width:{width}">{content}</div><script>jQuery(document).ready(function($){csv_custom_table({'bzebra':'{bzebra}','bhover':'{bhover}','hbgcolor':'{hbgcolor}','bbgcolor':'{bbgcolor}','bbtype':'{bbtype}','bbwidth':'{bbwidth}','bbcolor':'{bbcolor}','tbcolor':'{tbcolor}','tbwidth':'{tbwidth}','tbtype':'{tbtype}','bgcolor':'{bgcolor}','bcolor':'{bcolor}','hcolor':'{hcolor}','hbcolor':'{hbcolor}','hbwidth':'{hbwidth}','hbtype':'{hbtype}','sel':'#sws_table{uid}','template':'sws_custom_table','width':'100%'});});</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_php</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_css</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<style>
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function csv_custom_table(o){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		$(o.sel).addClass('sws_csv_table_loading');
		$(o.sel).find('table:first')
			.hide()
			.addClass(o.template)
			.css('width', (undefined==o.width||''==o.width?'auto':o.width) )
			.css('background-color','#'+o.bgcolor)
			.css('border-style', o.tbtype )
			.css('border-width', o.tbwidth+'px' )
			.css('border-color','#'+o.tbcolor);
		$(o.sel).find('table:first tr th')
			.css('color', '#'+o.hcolor )
			.css('background-color','#'+o.hbgcolor)
			.css('border-bottom-style', o.hbtype )
			.css('border-bottom-width', o.hbwidth+'px' )
			.css('border-bottom-color','#'+o.hbcolor);
		$(o.sel).find('table:first tr td')
			.css('color','#'+o.bcolor)
			.css('border-bottom-style', o.bbtype )
			.css('border-bottom-width', o.bbwidth+'px' )
			.css('border-bottom-color','#'+o.bbcolor);
		$(o.sel).find('table:first tbody tr')
			.css('background-color','#'+o.bbgcolor);
		$(o.sel).find('table:first tr.odd')
			.css('background-color','#'+o.bzebra);		
		$(o.sel).find('table:first tbody tr').hover(
			function(){
				$(this).attr('rel', $(this).css('background-color') );
				$(this).css('background-color','#'+o.bhover);
			},
			function(){
				$(this).css('background-color', $(this).attr('rel') );
			}
		);	
		$(o.sel).find('table:first').slideDown('fast',function(){
			$(o.sel).removeClass('sws_csv_table_loading');
		});
	});
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_fields</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:21:{s:5:"width";O:8:"stdClass":16:{s:4:"name";s:5:"width";s:5:"label";s:5:"Width";s:7:"default";s:4:"100%";s:7:"classes";s:0:"";s:6:"jsfunc";s:0:"";s:11:"description";s:49:"Specify a width with units. Example 300px or 100%";s:7:"content";s:1:"0";s:4:"type";s:4:"text";s:7:"options";s:11:"|--choose--";s:3:"min";s:0:"";s:3:"max";s:0:"";s:4:"step";s:1:"1";s:9:"shortcode";s:0:"";s:18:"shortcode_template";s:0:"";s:12:"field_number";s:0:"";s:12:"button_label";s:0:"";}s:11:"table_label";O:8:"stdClass":16:{s:4:"name";s:11:"table_label";s:5:"label";s:12:"Table styles";s:7:"default";s:0:"";s:7:"classes";s:0:"";s:6:"jsfunc";s:0:"";s:11:"description";s:0:"";s:7:"content";s:1:"0";s:4:"type";s:5:"label";s:7:"options";s:11:"|--choose--";s:3:"min";s:0:"";s:3:"max";s:0:"";s:4:"step";s:1:"1";s:9:"shortcode";s:0:"";s:18:"shortcode_template";s:0:"";s:12:"field_number";s:0:"";s:12:"button_label";s:0:"";}s:7:"bgcolor";O:8:"stdClass":16:{s:4:"name";s:7:"bgcolor";s:5:"label";s:16:"Background 			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function custom_table(o){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		$(o.sel).addClass('sws_csv_table_loading');
		$(o.sel).find('table:first')
			.hide()
			.addClass(o.template)
			.css('width', (undefined==o.width||''==o.width?'auto':o.width) )
			.css('background-color','#'+o.bgcolor)
			.css('border-style', o.tbtype )
			.css('border-width', o.tbwidth+'px' )
			.css('border-color','#'+o.tbcolor);
		$(o.sel).find('table:first tr th')
			.css('color', '#'+o.hcolor )
			.css('background-color','#'+o.hbgcolor)
			.css('border-bottom-style', o.hbtype )
			.css('border-bottom-width', o.hbwidth+'px' )
			.css('border-bottom-color','#'+o.hbcolor);
		$(o.sel).find('table:first tr td')
			.css('color','#'+o.bcolor);
		if('hidden'!=o.bbtype){
			$(o.sel).find('table:first tr td')
				.css('border-bottom-style', o.bbtype )
				.css('border-bottom-width', o.bbwidth+'px' )
				.css('border-bottom-color','#'+o.bbcolor);
		}	
		$(o.sel).find('table:first tbody tr')
			.css('background-color','#'+o.bbgcolor);
		if(''!=o.bzebra){
			$(o.sel).find('table:first tr.odd')
				.css('background-color','#'+o.bzebra);		
			$(o.sel).find('table:first tbody tr').hover(
				function(){
					$(this).attr('rel', $(this).css('background-color') );
					$(this).css('background-color','#'+o.bhover);
				},
				function(){
					$(this).css('background-color', $(this).attr('rel') );
				}
			);	
		}
		$(o.sel).find('table:first').slideDown('fast',function(){
			$(o.sel).removeClass('sws_csv_table_loading');
		});
	});
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

.picture_frame1 {
	background:url("{pluginurl}images/frame_all_corners.png") no-repeat scroll 0 0 transparent;
	height:270px !important;
	width:380px !important;
	margin-bottom:10px;
}

div.sws_frame_left {
float:left;
	margin-right: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_right {
float:right;
	margin-left: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_center {
display: block !important;
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
clear:both;
}

.picture_frame1 .picture_frame1_img,
.picture_frame1 .frame-zoom-wrap{
	width:320px;
	height:197px;
	padding: 29px 21px 20px 30px;
}

.picture_frame1 img {
max-width:none !important;
max-height:none !important;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

});
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>

.picture_frame8 {
	background:url("{pluginurl}images/frame_top_right.png") no-repeat scroll 0 0 transparent;
	height:242px !important;
	width:367px !important;
	margin-bottom:10px;
}

div.sws_frame_left {
float:left;
	margin-right: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_right {
float:right;
	margin-left: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_center {
display: block !important;
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
clear:both;
}

.picture_frame8 .picture_frame8_img,
.picture_frame8 .frame-zoom-wrap{
	width:320px;
	height:197px;
    padding: 29px 0px 20px 21px;
}

.picture_frame8 img {
max-width:none !important;
max-height:none !important;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function($){ 
	$(".picture_frame8").sws_preloadify({ imagedelay:500 });
});
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>

}

div.sws_frame_left {
float:left;
	margin-right: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_right {
float:right;
	margin-left: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_center {
display: block !important;
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
clear:both;
}

.picture_frame13 .picture_frame13_img,
.picture_frame13 .frame-zoom-wrap{
	width:197px;
	height:320px;
    padding: 20px 21px;
}

.picture_frame13 img {
max-width:none !important;
max-height:none !important;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function($){ 
	$(".picture_frame13").sws_preloadify({ imagedelay:500 });
});
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_fields</wp:meta_key>

	margin-right: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_right {
float:right;
	margin-left: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_center {
display: block !important;
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
clear:both;
}

	width:197px;
	height:320px;
    padding: 30px 21px 20px 18px;
}

.picture_frame15 img {

}

	width:248px !important;
	margin-bottom:10px;
}

div.sws_frame_left {
float:left;
	margin-right: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_right {
float:right;
	margin-left: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_center {
display: block !important;
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
clear:both;
}

.picture_frame18 .picture_frame18_img,
.picture_frame18 .frame-zoom-wrap{
	width:197px;
	height:320px;
    padding: 24px 21px 20px 34px;
}

.picture_frame18 img {
max-width:none !important;
max-height:none !important;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>

<script>jQuery(document).ready(function($){sws_button_styles({'sel':'#sws-button{uid}','template':'{template}', 'textcolor':'{textcolor}','bgcolor':'{bgcolor}','bgcolorhover':'{bgcolorhover}'});});</script>]]></wp:meta_value>

			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
function sws_button_styles(o){
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		if(o.bgcolor!=''||o.bgcolorhover!=''){
			$(o.sel).removeClass(o.template+'_bg');
			$(o.sel).addClass('sws-button-custom');
		}
		if(o.textcolor!=''){
			$(o.sel+' span').css('color','#'+o.textcolor);
		}
		if(o.bgcolor!=''){
			$(o.sel).css('background','#'+o.bgcolor);
		}
		
		$(o.sel).hover(function(){
			if(o.bgcolorhover!=''){
				$(o.sel).css('background','#'+o.bgcolorhover);
			}				
		},function(){
			if(o.bgcolor!=''){
				$(o.sel).css('background','#'+o.bgcolor);
			}
		});		 
	});
}
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

.sws_hyperlink {text-decoration:none;}

a.sws-hover1:hover {
border-bottom:0px !important;
}
a.sws-hover2:hover {
border-bottom:1px !important;
}

a.sws-bkgcolor1:hover {
background:none !important;
}

a.sws-bkgcolor2:hover {

}

</style>]]></wp:meta_value>

		</wp:postmeta>

	margin-bottom:10px;

div.sws_frame_left {

	margin-right: 20px;
}

float:right;
	margin-left: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_center {
display: block !important;
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
clear:both;
}

	width:300px;
	height:300px;
	padding: 20px 19px 29px 31px;
}

max-width:none !important;

}

	margin-right: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_right {
float:right;
	margin-left: 20px;
}

div.sws_frame_center {
display: block !important;
margin-left: auto !important;
margin-right: auto !important;
clear:both;
}

.picture_frame32 .picture_frame32_img,
.picture_frame32 .frame-zoom-wrap{
	width:300px;
	height:300px;
	padding: 26px 24px 23px 26px;
}

.picture_frame32 img {
max-width:none !important;
max-height:none !important;
}
</style>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_js</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function($){ 
	$(".picture_frame32").sws_preloadify({ imagedelay:500 });
});
</script>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>sc_fields</wp:meta_key>

false|No";s:3:"min";s:0:"";s:3:"max";s:0:"";s:4:"step";s:1:"1";s:9:"shortcode";s:0:"";s:18:"shortcode_template";s:0:"";s:12:"field_number";s:0:"";s:12:"button_label";s:0:"";}s:4:"size";O:8:"stdClass":17:{s:4:"name";s:4:"size";s:5:"label";s:4:"Size";s:7:"default";s:5:"small";s:7:"classes";s:0:"";s:6:"jsfunc";s:0:"";s:11:"description";s:15:"The button size";s:7:"content";s:1:"0";s:4:"type";s:8:"dropdown";s:17:"dropdown_callback";s:0:"";s:7:"options";s:73:"|--choose a size--

._{background}{
    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #{background};
    border-color: #{bordercolor};
    border-radius: 4px 4px 4px 4px;
    border-style: {borderstyle};
    border-width: 1px 0 0;
    font-family: 'Helvetica Neue',Arial,Helvetica,'Liberation Sans',FreeSans,sans-serif sans-serif;
    font-size: 11px;
    height: 20px;
    margin: 15px 0 25px;
    padding: 10px;
    width: {backgroundwidth}px;
}
</style>
<div class="_{background}">
<a href="http://twitter.com/{name}" class="twitter-follow-button" data-button="{colorbutton}"  data-show-count="{showcounter}" data-lang="{language}" data-align="{align}" data-width="{width}">Follow @{name}</a>

float:right;
margin:0 0 0 20px;
}

text-align:center;
width:100%;
display:block;
clear:both;
margin:10px auto;
}

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:2:{s:5:"title";O:8:"stdClass":7:{s:4:"name";s:5:"title";s:5:"label";s:5:"Title";s:7:"default";s:0:"";s:4:"type";s:4:"text";s:7:"options";s:11:"|--choose--";s:3:"min";s:0:"";s:3:"max";s:0:"";}s:11:"marginright";O:8:"stdClass":17:{s:4:"name";s:11:"marginright";s:5:"label";s:12:"Right Margin";s:7:"default";s:0:"";s:7:"classes";s:0:"";s:6:"jsfunc";s:0:"";s:11:"description";s:103:"Optional: This is for the space between columns, is necessary to add the unit size. Ex. 4%, 10px, 1.5em";s:7:"content";s:1:"0";s:4:"type";s:4:"text";s:17:"dropdown_callback";s:0:"";s:7:"options";s:11:"|--choose--";s:3:"min";s:0:"";s:3:"max";s:0:"";s:4:"step";s:1:"1";s:9:"shortcode";s:0:"";s:18:"shortcode_template";s:0:"";s:12:"field_number";s:0:"";s:12:"button_label";s:0:"";}}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>

		<title>2 Columns Last (without Title)</title>
		<link>http://interoccupy.net/sandycoord/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=127</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 28 Jun 2012 12:25:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://interoccupy.net/testhub/?post_type=csshortcode&#038;p=127</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>127</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2012-06-28 08:25:28</wp:post_date>
